description: Scholarly undead masters of preservation and cold calculation who have transcended death to pursue eternal knowledge. Liches represent the ultimate expression of Glacius's philosophy - that true immortality comes through perfect preservation of knowledge and understanding.

origin_island.description: A crystalline realm of eternal winter where vast libraries and research institutions preserve knowledge across the ages. The culture values scholarship, precision, and methodical advancement.
origin_island.cultural_philosophy: Knowledge is power, preservation is perfection, death is merely another state of existence to be studied and mastered.

eldritch_connection.divine_manifestation: Glacius, the Eternal Frost - Perfect preservation through absolute knowledge
eldritch_connection.player_freedom: Players can choose any god alignment or remain independent
eldritch_connection.cultural_pressure: Archive Realm culture strongly encourages Glacius worship but respects scholarly pursuits regardless of divine alignment

damage_type_affinity.cultural_preference: Cold damage is highly respected in Archive Realm culture
damage_type_affinity.mechanical_freedom: No restrictions on learning or mastering other damage types
damage_type_affinity.starting_bonus: Enhanced effectiveness with cold-based abilities and resistance to cold effects

attribute_inheritance.total_per_level: 15 attribute points distributed according to hexagonal pattern
attribute_inheritance.cultural_development: Archive Realm education emphasizes analytical thinking, research methodology, and preservation techniques
attribute_inheritance.growth_philosophy: Exceptional intelligence growth with strong support in wisdom and adaptability, reflecting the scholarly pursuit of knowledge

class_characteristics.core_philosophy: Death is merely another form of preservation
class_characteristics.life_approach: Transform obstacles through knowledge and preparation
class_characteristics.social_role: Scholar, Researcher, Keeper of Ancient Wisdom
class_characteristics.combat_style: Calculated application of knowledge, preparation-based tactics, intellectual dominance
signature_abilities: Undead Resilience - Enhanced resistance to physical and magical effects
Scholarly Mastery - Exceptional learning speed and knowledge retention
Cold Calculation - Enhanced strategic thinking and tactical analysis
Archive Access - Connection to vast stores of preserved knowledge
Death Transcendence - Unique perspective on mortality and preservation

cultural_background.typical_upbringing: Raised in the great libraries and research institutions of Glacius Isle, surrounded by ancient tomes and scholarly mentors
cultural_background.social_expectations: Expected to contribute to the preservation and expansion of knowledge
common_motivations: Preserving important information for future generations
Achieving perfect understanding of specific subjects
Transcending mortal limitations through scholarly pursuit

traditional_progression: Novice Scholar - Basic research and preservation skills
Archive Keeper - Responsible for maintaining knowledge stores
Master Researcher - Leading investigations into unknown subjects
Elder Lich - Transcendent understanding and teaching authority
Eternal Archivist - Legendary status with access to all preserved knowledge
alternative_developments: Battle Scholar - Applying academic knowledge to combat situations
Diplomatic Archivist - Using knowledge for international relations
Experimental Researcher - Pushing boundaries of known understanding
Cross-Cultural Scholar - Studying and preserving knowledge from other islands

multiclass_synergies: Lich/Succubus - Scholarly shapeshifter with adaptive research capabilities
Lich/Priestess - Wisdom-focused scholar with spiritual insight
Lich/Hunter - Mobile researcher with enhanced information gathering

player_customization.personality_freedom: Players can be warm mentors, cold calculators, passionate researchers, or detached observers
player_customization.moral_alignment: Can be benevolent preservers, neutral scholars, or calculating knowledge hoarders
player_customization.social_approach: Can be hermit researchers, social academics, or diplomatic intellectuals

hexagon_integration.trinity_benefits: Enhanced material world interaction, linear attribute scaling, gear/skill requirement advantages
hexagon_integration.offensive_layer_preference: Precision Strikes - Calculated application of force with perfect timing
hexagon_integration.defensive_layer_preference: Calculated Avoidance - Using knowledge to prevent problems before they occur

level_10_example.description: A level 10 Lich with exceptional analytical capabilities and well-rounded support attributes

adjacent_class_relationships.priestess: Shared wisdom focus creates natural philosophical exchanges

opposing_class_tension.warrior: Preservation vs. Action - Fundamental difference between scholarly caution and direct confrontation

lore_connections.divine_positioning: Aligned with Position 1 - The Foundation of Knowledge
lore_connections.cosmic_significance: Represents the principle that consciousness can transcend physical limitations through perfect understanding
lore_connections.mythological_role: The eternal students of Yggdrasil's wisdom, preserving knowledge across cosmic cycles
lore_connections.island_legends: Famous Liches have preserved critical knowledge through multiple reality instances, ensuring continuity of wisdom

typical_representatives: Archive Master Kelleth - Head librarian of the Great Glacius Repository
Researcher Prime Vorthak - Leading expert on inter-realm magical theory
Elder Scholar Mythara - Ancient Lich who remembers the previous reality instance
cultural_variations: Battle-Scholar Korvain - Lich who applies academic knowledge to tactical situations
Diplomatic Archivist Selene - Lich focused on preserving inter-cultural knowledge
Wandering Researcher Thymon - Lich who travels to gather knowledge from other realms

player_freedom_emphasis.damage_type_openness: While naturally aligned with cold, Liches can master fire, lightning, chaos, physical, or radiance without restriction
player_freedom_emphasis.divine_choice: Can worship any god, practice multiple faiths, or remain independent scholars
player_freedom_emphasis.personality_range: From warm, caring mentors to coldly calculating researchers to passionate knowledge seekers
player_freedom_emphasis.social_roles: Can be hermits, teachers, diplomats, adventurers, or leaders depending on player choice
player_freedom_emphasis.moral_flexibility: Can be benevolent preservers of knowledge, neutral researchers, or even knowledge hoarders - the class supports all approaches

attribute_progression.intelligence: Primary focus - 6 points per level for exceptional analytical growth
attribute_progression.adaptability_wisdom: Secondary focus - 3 points each per level for scholarly flexibility and insight
attribute_progression.dexterity_vitality: Moderate growth - 2 points each per level for basic physical capability
attribute_progression.strength: Minimal growth - 1 point per level to prevent complete physical weakness

trinity_benefits.fundamental_trinity: Enhanced gear usage, skill prerequisites, and material world interaction
trinity_benefits.equipment_synergy: Intelligence-based gear requirements align with natural growth

suggested_starting_stats.other_attributes: Standard starting values with guaranteed per-level growth
